alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley; Chukchi Sea Coast; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 1:16PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Strong Storm Moving Into the Bering and Chukchi Wednesday to Friday... A strong storm is forecast to develop in Eastern Russia on Wednesday and move into the Chukchi Sea on Thursday and Friday. Strong southwesterly winds are expected to accompany this storm over the northern Bering and the Chukchi Seas from Wednesday into Friday. This will bring an elevated risk of coastal flooding from the Bering Strait north to Utqiagvik Wednesday night into Friday, with high surf possible on south and west facing shores of Norton Sound Wednesday night into Friday. For the latest forecasts go to www.weather.gov/fairbanks.
